profile.name: Achmad Fathullah
profile.title: Apple Developer Academy Graduate Cohort 4 | Mobile Engineer | Problem Solver | Enhancing Mobile Performance & User Experience @Qiscus
profile.bio: Senior Mobile Engineer with 5+ years of experience building high-performance, scalable mobile applications across Flutter, Android (Kotlin/Java), iOS (Swift), and React Native. Proven expertise in Clean Architecture, MVVM/MVI/BLoC patterns, and SOLID principles. Skilled in performance optimization, automated testing (JUnit, Mockito, Espresso), and CI/CD implementation. Apple Developer Academy Graduate (Cohort 4) with strong foundation in modern mobile development practices. Experienced in leading technical features from concept to release, mentoring junior developers, and collaborating with cross-functional teams in Agile environments. Passionate about delivering user-centric, secure, and maintainable mobile solutions that serve millions of users.

experience.title: Android Developer (Kotlin & Java)

Developed and maintained Android applications using Kotlin and Java, implementing MVVM architecture with Android Architecture Components (ViewModel, LiveData, Room). [TODO: Add features - e.g., 'Built real-time chat system, file sharing, push notifications, offline-first architecture'].

UI Development - Built responsive UIs following Material Design 3 guidelines. Optimized RecyclerView with ViewHolder pattern, DiffUtil, and pagination for smooth scrolling. [TODO: Add migration details - e.g., 'Migrated 40% of legacy Views to Jetpack Compose, reducing UI code by 30%']. Implemented custom views and animations for enhanced UX.

Dependency Injection & Reactive Programming - Architected dependency injection using Dagger 2 and Hilt for improved testability and maintainability. Implemented reactive programming with RxJava 2/3 and migrated to Kotlin Coroutines + Flow for cleaner asynchronous code. [TODO: Add impact - e.g., 'Reduced callback hell, improved code readability by 40%'].

Achieved 65%+ test coverage with target of 80%. Implemented TDD for critical business logic. Created reusable test fixtures and factories. [TODO: Add examples - e.g., 'Wrote 500+ test cases covering edge cases', 'Automated 90% of regression tests'].

RESTful API Integration - Integrated backend services using Retrofit 2 with OkHttp for networking. Implemented efficient caching strategies (memory + disk cache), retry mechanisms, and offline support. [TODO: Add performance - e.g., 'Reduced API calls by 45% through smart caching', 'Improved app responsiveness with optimistic UI updates'].

Performance & Optimization - Profiled app performance using Android Studio Profiler (CPU, Memory, Network). Identified and fixed memory leaks with LeakCanary. Optimized cold start times through lazy initialization and background threading. [TODO: Add metrics - e.g., 'Reduced cold start from 2.5s to 0.8s', 'Decreased memory footprint by 35%', 'Fixed 12 critical memory leaks'].

experience.title: Full-stack Software Developer
experience.description:
Has finished on several system projects, namely scholarship information systems and reminder information systems (management system for foreign students who will continue their studies at the university or who will take time off, manage their personal data then give warnings / reminders to e-mails of foreign students when there is important information that must be immediately followed up).

Projects:
1. Scholarship information systems (http://kemahasiswaan.uin-malang.ac.id/beasiswa)
2. Reminder Information systems (http://isa.uin-malang.ac.id/reminder/)
3. PDAM Giri Tirta Gresik Apps

projects.title: Sitamoto Mobile Apps
projects.description: Kelola perangkat IoT kamu cukup dengan sentuhan tombol atau menggunakan suara, kami memberikan pendekatan yang mudah dan praktis namun detail untuk kebutuhan pemakaian perangkat IoT sehari-hari

projects.title: Ceklok Mobile Apps
projects.description: CEKLOK merupakan platform HRIS yang ikut berkembang dengan perusahaan. Features: Authentication with AI face Recognition, Absence & Leave, Overtime, etc

projects.title: Commjunction Mobile Apps
projects.description: COMMJUNCTION memberikan platform komunitas yang dapat dipersonalisasikan dengan kebutuhan sebuah komunitas untuk mencapai tujuan bersama

projects.title: Bank Mandiri Taspen Backoffice
projects.description: Web app page for Mobile Banking to record and manage all transaction on Mobile Banking Mandiri Taspen. Backoffice merupakan aplikasi berbasis web yang berfungsi untuk mencatat aktifitas yang dilakukan mobile banking, pengelola user mobile banking (Lupa password, Pendaftaran User baru, Block user, etc), Pencatat log error dan transaksi, Pembukaan deposito special rate dan lain lain.

projects.title: Sistem Informasi Beasiswa UIN Malang
projects.description: Sistem Informasi Beasiswa (SIBEA) merupakan sistem manajemen penerimaan dan pendaftaran beasiswa lingkup Universitas Islam Negeri Maulana Malik Ibrahim Malang

projects.title: Sistem Informasi Reminder UIN Malang
projects.description: Reminder information systems (management system for foreign students who will continue their studies at the university or who will take time off, manage their personal data then give warnings / reminders to e-mails of foreign students when there is important information that must be immediately followed up)

projects.title: Popular Movies App
projects.description: This is my version of Udacity's Popular Movie project. In this project implementing The Movie DB API of popular movies, top rated movies, movie's trailers and reviews. It also has endless scroll on movies list. It is also implementing Model View Presenter (MVP) architecture. I build this as part of Udacity Associate Android Developer Fast Track program.

testimonials.name: Muharam Adi Nugraha
testimonials.message:
I'm working with Mr. Achmad Fathulah his Manager trough Mr. Yunizar as his team leader with daily basis communication as a System Analyst & UI/UX Designer. Mr. Achmad Fathulah shows a great talent on development for Android Development with such punctuality, given the problems and opportunities, he had shown his great potential by dealing with such complicated matters in short time, showing a steady increase of Performance mades him a great talent with great personality so to speak.

He had shown her great talent as Mobile Development Engineer especially on Android Mobile Development, It is such an honor to be working with Mr. Achmad and I hope the best for his future and what comes next on his career.

testimonials.name: Mr. Fahudi

testimonials.message: Aplikasinya menarik, simple dan sesuai dengan kebutuhan yang ada.

testimonials.message: Achmad is Good Personal, Hard work, fast learning, funny, and have innovative good in current project.
